page.title: 11Entertainment and Clubs cont
page.content: In our survey we found that about half the people surveyed spent most of there lesuire time in the village and the other half said that the sports facilities were better and more varied outside the village.Of all the people interviewed only a quarter of them said they did not like living in the village and would move out if they were able. One of the highlights of the year for the{Yaxley }community is the { {Yaxley}gala which is held once a year in June.A number of orginations combine their efforts to make it a worth while day.Among the activities are a float parade,five a side football,children's pet show,childrens fancy dress,craft shows and displays.There are also innumerable stalls selling a great variety of goods.
